actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To modify the project for flood control, San Timoteo Creek, California, to permit the non-Federal contribution for certain costs of the project to be made after completion of the project.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Modifies the project for flood control, San Timoteo Creek, California, to permit the non-Federal contribution for certain project costs to be made, with interest, over a period to be determined by the non-Federal sponsor, but not to exceed 30 years after project completion.

titles.title: To modify the project for flood control, San Timoteo Creek, California, to permit the non-Federal contribution for certain costs of the project to be made after completion of the project.
